messages.message:
Hey team,

Is there a way to skip licensing/Metronome for local deployments? I noticed that the `ENABLE_LICENSING` flag mentioned only on one API (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/0962d5452c645fe335188570955ec945ffbcfc7c/webserver/api-server/src/py/instabase/api_server/handler/api/v2/aihub/licenses.py#L761), can’t be disabled for the others.

Additionally, I’m running into license/metronome issues when trying to use local AIHub setup. Are there any additional steps? I’m getting the error “Account … is not integrated with Metronome” on the `api/v2/licenses/billing-plan` and `api/v2/licenses/billing-plans/history` APIs.

cc @Victor Zeng
are you using the dogfood.instabase.com (http://dogfood.instabase.com) db? if so, we have a commercial org there with infinite credits to use for testing
`ENABLE_LICENSING=false` and no metronome API key should do it.
